author: colizz
body:
#### PR description:

In the 4-thead workflow of 573, a segfault of the sherpa generator can **randomly** occur. The reason is that some thread will probabilistically handle zero events resulting from the first-come-first-serve principle to arrange events to threads. We enlarge the event number from 10 to 50 to fix this issue.

Please see more details in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34527#issuecomment-907664078.

Besides, the waitTime in this workflow will be set to the default value (reverting e27c1367ab1790b236a38bee7699ea19e9053b3a), given the timeout issue in ExternalGeneratorFilter has been permanently solved in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34815.

A backport to 12_0_X and 10_6_X is also needed.

#### PR validation:

Workflow 573 runs in the 4-thread mode.
title: Fix the random segfault of RelVal workflow 573
